checkLiquidatable(address,address).details: Checks if a position is liquidatable

params.router: The address of the lending pool router
params.user: The address of the user to check

returns.borrowValue: The current borrow value in USD
returns.collateralValue: The current collateral value in USD
returns.isLiquidatable: Whether the position can be liquidated

isHealthy(address,address).custom:security: This function should be called before allowing new borrows
isHealthy(address,address).details: Checks if a lending position is healthy based on various parameters

params.router: The address of the lending pool router
params.user: The address of the user to check

returns._0: The address of the liquidator contract

params.factory: The address of the factory contract

params.router: The address of the lending pool router
The address of the lending pool router

isHealthy(address,address).notice: This function validates if a position meets health requirements
